name: co-once
description: Wrap a generator that can be called only once

scripts.cover: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --require should --require co-mocha test.js
scripts.coveralls: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter dot --require should --require co-mocha test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Bence DÃ¡nyi <bence@danyi.me>
